text: nivu nim'ma (hajj‌na) karmagalannella mugisikonda balika, (i hinde) nivu nim'ma purvajarannu smarisuttidda ritiyalli athava adakkintalu adhikavagi allahanannu smarisiri. Janaralli kelavaru ‘‘nam'modeya, namage i lokadalli nidu’’ endu (matra) prarthisuttare. Avarige paralokadalli yava palu iradu
